t: Koto gives Amazon's brand a global refresh without losing its smile | Creative Boom
s: April 30, 2025 - Over the past 18 months, Koto has worked quietly behind the scenes to unify Amazon's sprawling visual ecosystem, redesigning the tech giant's master brand and over 50 sub-brands into a modern, flexible system built for global scale.
